content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (6.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0) with coal as fuel. The furnace has 48 units of coal in the fuel inventory and is currently working with 46 units of iron ore in the source inventory. It contains 20 iron plates in the output inventory.

### Research Lab at Position (6.5, -57.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (6.5, -57.5) with power. The lab is currently not conducting any research and has 2 automation science packs remaining.

### Offshore Pump, Boiler, and Steam Engine Setup at Position (-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) with water present in connections. It is connected to a fluid system and working.
- Boiler at position (-5.5, 24.0) currently out of fuel and not working. It is connected to the steam engine.
- Steam Engine at position (-1.5, 24.5) connected to the boiler. It is not connected to the power network and has warnings about no input liquid and no fluid present in connections.

### Pipe Group for Fluid Transport
Consists of the following entities:
- Pipes connecting the offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5) to the boiler at position (-5.5, 24.0) and further to the steam engine. The pipe group includes connections at positions (-8.5, 23.5), (-9.5, 23.5), (-7.5, 23.5), (-7.5, 24.5), and others extending to the steam engine.

### Electricity Group
Consists of the following entities:
- Small Electric Pole at position (0.5, 26.5), now effectively connected to the steam engine.
- Small Electric Pole at position (0.5, 21.5), part of the electricity group and connected to the steam engine.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without having them in inventory
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to place is available in your inventory. For example, attempting to place a small electric pole failed because there was no small electric pole in the inventory.

### Errors due to insufficient crafting materials
- Verify that you have all the necessary materials before attempting to craft an item. For instance, crafting a stone furnace requires 5 stones, but the agent had 0 stones available, leading to a crafting failure. Similarly, the agent was missing 3 copper plates needed to craft copper cables.
- Ensure you have enough iron plates before crafting. An error occurred due to missing 4 iron plates needed to craft a steam engine.
- Ensure you have enough materials for crafting automation science packs. The agent needed more iron plates or copper plates to craft the required number of automation science packs.

### Errors when inserting items without having them in inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity. For example, attempting to insert coal into a furnace failed because there was no coal in the inventory at that time. Similarly, an error occurred when trying to insert 20 units of coal into the boiler without having coal in the inventory.

### Errors due to insufficient extraction of items
- Ensure that the required number of items are available for extraction. For example, an assertion error occurred because the agent attempted to extract 10 iron plates but only 9 were available. Always check the available quantity before extraction to avoid such errors.
- Ensure that the entity from which you are attempting to extract items actually contains those items. For example, an error occurred when trying to extract iron plates from the stone furnace at (6.0, -62.0) because it did not contain any iron plates.

### Errors when using incorrect argument types
- Ensure that you are passing the correct argument types to functions. An error occurred because a position was passed instead of an Entity or EntityGroup. Always check the function documentation to confirm the expected argument types.

### Errors due to furnace not working after restocking
- Ensure that the furnace has all necessary ingredients and conditions to start working after restocking. The agent restocked the furnace with coal, but it did not start working because there were no ingredients to smelt. Always verify that the furnace has both fuel and ingredients.

### Errors due to missing iron ore in inventory
- Ensure that you have iron ore in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the furnace. An error occurred because there was no iron ore in the inventory to insert into the furnace. Always check your inventory for the required materials before attempting to insert them into a furnace.

### Errors due to incorrect inventory assertion
- Ensure that the inventory assertion checks are correctly implemented. An assertion error occurred because the check for iron ore
